mapper.insert: insert into sns_data(sns_name, sns_title, sns_content, sns_writer, like_cnt, reply_cnt, share_cnt, writeDate, keyword, keyword_type, url) values (#{sns_name}, #{sns_title}, #{sns_content}, #{sns_writer}, #{like_cnt}, #{reply_cnt}, #{share_cnt}, #{writeDate}, #{keyword}, #{keyword_type}, #{url})
mapper.update: update sns_data set sns_name = #{sns_name}, sns_title = #{sns_title}, sns_content = #{sns_content}, sns_writer = #{sns_writer}, like_cnt = #{like_cnt}, reply_cnt = #{reply_cnt}, share_cnt = #{share_cnt}, writeDate = #{writeDate}, keyword = #{keyword}, keyword_type = #{keyword_type}, url = #{url}, updateDate = now() where sns_idx = #{sns_idx}
mapper.select: select * from sns_data where textType is not null and community_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or community_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by createdate limit #{startPage}, #{pageUnit}
